One year later, one of them is found dead and the original murder case becomes even more mysterious. Almost fifteen years pass and the lead inspector, now approaching retirement, reflects on the only case he could not solve in an otherwise successful career. This movie is about how a joint USA- Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn exactly what happened to the "Discovery" and its H. A. L. 9000 computer.

As they work together with the other members of the expedition, they are forced to confront their own fears and insecurities, as well as those of the other members of the expedition, in order to come up with a plan that will allow them to successfully complete their mission on behalf of the United States of America.
